content:
I just joined the FHIR Chat, Im trying to test the Smile CDR with Inferno and got struck with Configurations

Im able to setup both SmileCDR and Inferno in my local but not sure on how to connect or proceed further with configuring and making them work. I couldnd find any docs and ended up here

can you please help me?

Any resources videos or any help is appreciated
you could try on the #hapi stream?

FFR: Double posted in the #inferno stream, and answered there.
https://chat.fhir.org/#narrow/stream/179309-inferno/topic/Trouble.20configuring.20FHIR.20with.20smile.20CDR
